title: Cognitive Load Measurement and Optimization Strategies in Engineering Design

context.prior_knowledge: Understanding of Basic Engineering Design Processes and Problem-Solving Methodologies
context.additional_context: Training focused on measuring and optimizing cognitive load when solving complex design problems in mobile environments utilizing digital devices

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish types of cognitive load (intrinsic, extraneous, germane) in engineering design scenarios with over 80% accuracy.
Learners can accurately use real-time cognitive load measurement tools three or more times while performing design tasks in mobile environments.
Learners can analyze measured cognitive load data and propose three or more design process improvement strategies.
difficulty: Easy - Simple structure with minimal constraints
